rules_text:
[i]Fogado's Retainer[/i] – Whenever you play a land card, target creature you control explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[i]Party Animal[/i] – Nontoken creatures you control have “{T}: Each creature target player controls gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”
